channel.title: [req] Banner for Ice-webhosting.com's hosting company
channel.description:
Hi, I'm making a website for Ice-webhosting (Hosting company). Although I really suck at GFX. It would be nice if you could come up with some awsome banners for me and Ice-Webhosting.
It needs to be:
[ul][li]Light blue with "trees with snow on".[/li] [li]A server render[/li] [li]Have the word "Ice-Webhosting" on [/li] [li]And "Ice-Webhost.com" on it (in smaller)[/li][/ul]
It would be a great help if you could.
Thanks
~Skating on Java

item.title: [req] Banner for Ice-webhosting.com's hosting company
